com.pacman.game
Class Maze

java.lang.Object
  com.pacman.game.Maze

public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object

This is the Maze class that holds all the tiles of the maze. Each tile can have a different type such as WALL or Dot.

Author:
Thaer

Maze

Method Detail

getTile

public Tile getTile(int x,
                    int y)
Returns the requested tile if it is within range, otherwise returns null Integer tile positions. (0,0) is top-left, (10,5) would be 10 tiles to the right and 5 tiles down.

Parameters:
x -
y -
Returns:

isBlocked

public boolean isBlocked(int x,
                         int y,
                         MovableObject.Direction dir)
Checks if the tile is blocked.

Parameters:
x - x position of tile
y - y position of tile
dir - Takes in the movable objects direction since objects are allowed to pass through doors when they come from underneath.
Returns:

getTiles

public Tile[][] getTiles()
Gets the maze tiles

Returns:
